item.title: About
item.description: “Someone once told me the definition of hell; on your last day on earth, the person you could have become will meet the person you became.” - Anonymous Time is the currency of life. It holds the power to buy happiness, it has an ability to enhance any skill, it molds habit, it constructs a person, it’s the building block of success. One of the greatest loss is, when we are unable to take advantage of our valuable time in order to forge ourself to be a better person.
